By Kyle on Friday, July 6, 2001 - 07:23 pm:

Well, here's a bit of info that, I at least hope, everyone here could figure out for themselves. But, I have taken the liberty of doing it for you, so sit back and enjoy:)

Enemy Monster Totals

E Class:
Lontar - 677
Leone - 691
Harikicks - 777
Junomoule - 871
Oakleyman - 663
Nats - 545

(Notes -- Well, looky here. It seems that in theory Junomoule is the best overall opponent. And what's this??? Oakleyman is second worst. This shows you what that intangible "luck" factor can do.)

D Class:
Hailfall - 839
Winston - 966
Harimaoh - 958
Capella - 969
Milliam - 968
Palmer - 736
Sleetbomb - 875
Sakura Art -1127

(Notes -- Now, if another Mocchi has highest stats I'm gonna puke:) It really seems like these guys shouldn't be much better than E-class.)

C Class:
Zamber - 1486
Recknen - 1247
Pivorus - 1234
Rockgeiger -1203
Gunburn - 1436
Waranmo - 1370
Susvain - 1195
Nicolle - 1370
Hyoue - 1274
Ofrey - 1213

B Class:
Ghoulshine -1942
Pirrateau - 1499
Dewless - 1635
Robeneal - 1786
Epsilon - 1944
Liquel - 1663
Tiravail - 1332
Baluum - 1846
Aspin - 1877

A Class:
Kitty - 2436
Catalina - 2132
Sharkin - 2599
Lamsweet - 2732
Siva - 2493
Caplan - 2217
Arculon - 2429

(Notes -- Excuse me while I get a pail:) )

S Class:
Zagref - 3026
Thanatos - 3048
Goliath - 2726
Prometheus- 3160
Daphiel - 3096
Ordorf - 3069
Mahoroty - 2912
Aqualine - 3015

There you have it. If ever you wanted to know this, I hope your satisfied.
